::Zardus/FZ/DevilDuer::

Zardus slams against the controll panel, chest plate shooting sparks. The 
panel smashes inward, disabling door controlls. Zardus steadies himself 
against the closed door as he stands up.

"Kill him." He says through clenched teeth to Nemesis and to FZ and 
DevilDuer, who just came running up.

FZ and DevilDuer open fire on Serpentor. Zardus walks down the hallway and 
then turns around, adding his fire.
